mapper.insert:
SELECT 'CRS_INF-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(CRS_INF_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CRS_INF ( CRS_INF_ID, CRS_INF_ST_DT, CRS_INF_END_DT, CRS_INF_NM, CRS_INF_CRS_ROOM_NM, CRS_INF_PRS_CNT, CRS_INF_RGST_DT, CRS_INF_DEL_YN, CRS_INF_APP_DT, CRS_INF_DDLN_DT, CRS_INF_DDLN_YN ) VALUES ( #{crsInfId}, TO_DATE(#{crsInfStDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{crsInfEndDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{crsInfNm}, #{crsInfCrsRoomNm}, #{crsInfPrsCnt}, SYSDATE, 'N', TO_DATE(#{crsInfAppDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{crsInfDdlnDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CRS_INF WHERE CRS_INF_NM = #{crsInfNm} AND CRS_INF_DEL_YN = 'N' AND CRS_INF_DDLN_YN = 'N'

SELECT C.CRS_INF_ID , C.CRS_INF_NM , C.CRS_INF_ST_DT , C.CRS_INF_END_DT , C.CRS_INF_DDLN_DT , C.CRS_INF_PRS_CNT , COUNT(A.APP_HSTR_ID) AS CRS_CUR_PRS_CNT FROM CRS_INF C LEFT JOIN APP_HSTR A ON C.CRS_INF_ID = A.CRS_INF_ID LEFT JOIN CNCL_HSTR CN ON A.APP_HSTR_ID = CN.APP_HSTR_ID WHERE C.CRS_INF_DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.CRS_INF_DDLN_YN = 'N' AND CN.CNCL_HSTR_ID IS NULL GROUP BY C.CRS_INF_ID , C.CRS_INF_NM , C.CRS_INF_ST_DT , C.CRS_INF_END_DT , C.CRS_INF_DDLN_DT , C.CRS_INF_PRS_CNT ORDER BY C.CRS_INF_ST_DT DESC

SELECT C.CRS_INF_ID , C.CRS_INF_NM , C.CRS_INF_ST_DT , C.CRS_INF_END_DT FROM CRS_INF C WHERE C.CRS_INF_DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.CRS_INF_DDLN_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY C.CRS_INF_ID , C.CRS_INF_NM , C.CRS_INF_ST_DT , C.CRS_INF_END_DT , C.CRS_INF_PRS_CNT ORDER BY C.CRS_INF_ST_DT DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE CRS_INF SET CRS_INF_DEL_YN = 'Y' , CRS_INF_DEL_DT = SYSDATE WHERE CRS_INF_ID = #{crsInfId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CRS_INF WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN CRS_INF_ST_DT AND CRS_INF_END_DT AND CRS_INF_DEL_YN = 'N' AND CRS_INF_DDLN_YN = 'N'
